properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 10:04AM CST by NWS Shreveport LA
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a

* FLOOD WARNING FOR
the Ouachita River At Felsenthal Lock and Dam, Arkansas.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 9:30 AM Wednesday The pool stage was 69.9 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood pool stage is 70 feet.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage this Tuesday afternoon and continue to
rise to near 70.5 feet by Friday evening. Additional rises remain
possible thereafter.
* Impact...Minor and seasonal type flooding in the Felsenthal National
Wildlife Refuge.  Expect flooded trails and access roadways.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive vehicles through flooded waterways.  Use caution when
walking near flooded riverbanks.  Do not try to wade or swim in
flooded rivers and bayous.

For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website
address into your favorite web browser URL bar:
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv
